Void Functions.void_function_no_parameters: Function that does not return a value and takes no parameters
Void Functions.void_function_with_parameters: Function that does not return a value and that takes 1 or more defined parameters
Void Functions.void_function_with_keyword_parameters: Function that does not return a value and that takes 0 or more defined keyword parameters
Void Functions.void_function_variable_parameters: Function that does not return a value and function that takes an unknown number of parameters

Return Value Functions.return_value_function_no_parameters: Function that returns a value and takes no parameters
Return Value Functions.return_value_function_with_parameters: Function that returns a value and takes 1 or more defined parameters
Return Value Functions.return_value_function_with_keyword_param: Function that returns a value and takes 0 or more defined keyword parameters
Return Value Functions.return_value_function_variable_parameter: Function that returns a value and takes an unknown number of parameters

Lambda/Anonymous Functions.anonymous_function_no_parameters: Anonymous function that takes no parameters
Lambda/Anonymous Functions.anonymous_function_with_parameters: Anonymous function that takes 1 or more defined parameters
Lambda/Anonymous Functions.anonymous_function_with_keyword_paramete: Anonymous function that takes 0 or more defined keyword parameters
Lambda/Anonymous Functions.anonymous_function_variable_parameters: Anonymous function that takes an unknown number of parameters

Lambda/Anonymous Functions with Return V.anonymous_function_no_parameters_with_re: Anonymous function that takes no parameters and returns a value
Lambda/Anonymous Functions with Return V.anonymous_function_with_parameters_with_: Anonymous function that takes 1 or more defined parameters and returns a value
Lambda/Anonymous Functions with Return V.anonymous_function_with_keyword_paramete: Anonymous function that takes 0 or more defined keyword parameters and returns a value
Lambda/Anonymous Functions with Return V.anonymous_function_variable_parameters_w: Anonymous function that takes an unknown number of parameters and returns a value
